What you will work on

  • Evaluate pricing, promotions, and logistics experiments.
  • Build dashboards for ops and growth teams.
  • Investigate marketplace anomalies and propose fixes.

What makes you a fit

  1. Strong SQL and comfort with experimentation metrics.
  2. Business intuition for marketplace levers.
  3. Clear storytelling with data.

Interview stages

  • Recruiter screen.
  • Technical SQL/analytics case.
  • Panel with BizOps/PM/Data.
  • Offer with stipend and remote onboarding.

Ready to apply?

Applications close on 15 March 2026.
